See how to embed the StyleAI hairstyle transformation widget into any website

üìã Quick Integration

Add this simple HTML code to any webpage where you want the StyleAI widget to appear:

<!-- StyleAI Widget Container --> <div id="styleai-widget"></div> <!-- StyleAI Widget Script --> <script src="http://localhost:8080/embed.js"></script>

That's it! The widget will automatically load and be fully functional.

üîß Basic Integration

Simply add the HTML div and script tag. The widget auto-initializes.

üéØ Custom Container

Use a custom container ID for multiple widgets or specific placement.

üì± Responsive Design

The widget automatically adapts to different screen sizes and containers.

üé® Custom Styling

The widget maintains its internal styling but respects container constraints.
